channel.title: Configuring Qubes-VM-hardening (vm-boot-protect) prevents Anon-Connection-Wizard from running in sys-whonix
channel.description:
When Qubes-VM-hardening is configured in `whonix-gw-15` `Anon-Connection-Wizard` fails to start when `sys-whonix` is first run. This has never been an issue with previous Whonix releases.
This is simple to fix by running `whonixsetup` manually. Once this is done `sys-whonix` behaves normally.
https://github.com/tasket/Qubes-VM-hardening/issues/29

item.title: Configuring Qubes-VM-hardening (vm-boot-protect) prevents Anon-Connection-Wizard from running in sys-whonix
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
When Qubes-VM-hardening is configured in whonix-gw-15 Anon-Connection-Wizard fails to start when sys-whonix is first run. This has never been an issue with previous Whonix releases.

This is simple to fix by running whonixsetup manually. Once this is done sys-whonix behaves normally.

github.com/tasket/Qubes-VM-hardening

Issue: Anon-Connection-Wizard does not start in sys-whonix (whonix-gw 15)

opened by 0brand on 2019-07-12 
When sys-whonix is started for the first time Anon-Conection-Wizard is supposed to automaicaly start, and walk users through Tor setup and...
